article.title: A checklist of the satyrine genus Erebia (Lepidoptera) (17582006)
article.abstract: Since BCS Warren’s seminal Monograph of the circumpolar satyrine butterfly genus Erebia Dalman, 1816, was published in 1936, more than 320 new names and some 200 papers dealing wholly or in large part with the genus have been published. A modern checklist of more than 1,300 names proposed for butterflies of the genus Erebia (sensu stricto), all of which have been checked at source, is presented together with the source publication and type locality (TL). Also presented is a bibliography of 1,200 published items concerning the genus. The checklist covers the period 1758–2006; such names proposed and papers published as have been noted after the 31st of December 2006 are also included.
